A flexible AI step. ask it to analyze da: A flexible AI step. ask it to analyze data, explain, draft, or decide based on your flow's data.
Summarize long emails, articles, or docu: Summarize long emails, articles, or documents into what matters.
Create unique, high-quality images from: Create unique, high-quality images from simple text descriptions using AI.
Categorize any text input using custom l: Categorize any text input using custom labels, so your flow knows what to do next.
Accurately Pull names, amounts, and othe: Accurately Pull names, amounts, and other structured data from emails, invoices, and scanned documents.
Handles complex, multi-step tasks by rea: Handles complex, multi-step tasks by reasoning through problems, using tools accurately, and iterating until the job is done.
Controls the creativity of the AI respon: Controls the creativity of the AI response. A higher value will make the AI more creative and a lower value will make it more deterministic.
Whether to use web search to find inform: Whether to use web search to find information for the AI to use in its response.
Text to extract structured data from.
